message.name: ERR_TWO_REASONS_ENTERED
message.locale: Only one of withdrawal reason or other withdrawal reason details can be entered.

message.name: ERR_MANDATORY_INTAKE_PROGRAM_APPLICATION_ID
message.locale: A withdrawal request must be associated with an intake program application.

message.name: ERR_MANDATORY_SUBMITTED_DATE_TIME
message.locale: A submitted date time must be entered.

message.name: ERR_BEING_ADDRESSED_IN_CURAM
message.locale: This withdrawal request is being addressed by Curam, not an external system.

message.name: ERR_MANDATORY_TERMS_AND_COND
message.locale: You cannot withdraw your application(s) unless you check the box to confirm your electronic signature.

message.name: ERR_MANDATORY_PROGRAMS
message.locale: At least one program must be selected.

message.name: ERR_NO_REASON_ENTERED
message.locale: Either select a withdrawal reason or enter other withdrawal reason details.
